usage_notes.for_auditors: This provides traceability from raw method outputs to final assembled evidence.

validation_against_expected_elements.overall_validation_result: PASS - All required and minimum elements present

method_binding.note: All multiple methods extracted from D3_Q5_Executor in executors.py

epistemological_foundation.epistemological_stance: Triangulation across heterogeneous sources with explicit uncertainty.
epistemological_foundation.justification: Chosen because PRODUCTOS in PA08 must explain why the plan's commitments are coherent, measurable, and traceable to evidence.
epistemological_foundation.ontological_basis: Policy plans encode mechanisms via activities, outputs, and indicators; evidence is treated as fallible observations of underlying commitments.
theoretical_framework: Pearl (2009) causal reasoning (why mechanisms matter)
Pawson & Tilley (1997) realistic evaluation
Results-based management for public policy monitoring

technical_approach.algorithm: pattern extraction + multi-method pipeline + evidence graph synthesis
assumptions: The source plan contains at least one relevant section or table for this question.
Expected element types map to observable text spans or tabular cells.
technical_approach.complexity: O(n_patterns × n_text) for bounded regex matching + O(n_nodes + n_edges) for graph propagation.
limitations: Evidence quality depends on document structure and explicitness of commitments.
Pattern-only extraction is conservative to preserve determinism.

steps.description: Extract candidate claims and table structures from the document using contract patterns and policy-area scope.
Populate method outputs under provides slots and construct evidence nodes aligned to expected_elements.
Assemble aggregate evidence for elements_found and infer relationships to support synthesis and validation.
Compute completeness, gaps, and confidence interval for Q255/D3-Q5.

method_combination_logic.combination_strategy: Sequential multi-method pipeline with evidence fusion
method_combination_logic.confidence_aggregation: Final confidence per evidence element = weighted_mean([confidence_method1, confidence_method2, ...]) where weights reflect method reliability (e.g., Bayesian methods have higher weight than simple regex).
method_combination_logic.evidence_fusion: Evidence from all multiple methods is aggregated by the EvidenceNexus. Overlapping evidence (e.g., same numeric value detected by multiple methods) is deduplicated. Confidence scores are combined via weighted averaging.
method_combination_logic.execution_order: Methods execute in priority order (1→17). Later methods can access outputs of earlier methods (e.g., method 7 uses goals extracted by method 6).
method_combination_logic.rationale: D1-Q1 requires comprehensive extraction of quantitative baseline data from multiple sources (text, tables, causal links). The multiple methods cover complementary aspects: text mining (methods 1-5), goal extraction (6-7), financial analysis (8-10), contradiction detection (11-13), Bayesian inference (14-15), and semantic processing (16-17).
trade_offs: Comprehensiveness vs. Complexity: multiple methods ensure thorough coverage but increase computational cost and maintenance burden
Precision vs. Recall: Multiple methods increase recall (find more evidence) but may introduce redundancy; deduplication and confidence weighting mitigate this
Interpretability vs. Sophistication: Bayesian and embedding methods are powerful but less transparent than regex; human_readable_output compensates via methodological documentation

epistemological_foundation.justification: This method contributes to D3-Q5 analysis
theoretical_framework: Method _identify_confounders implements structured analysis for D3-Q5

assumptions: Input data is preprocessed and valid

steps.description: Invocar `PDETMunicipalPlanAnalyzer._identify_confounders` mediante `MethodExecutor.execute` con el contexto del documento y señales irrigadas (cuando estén disponibles).
Validar que la salida sea JSON-serializable y capturar fallos en trazas si aplica (sin detener el pipeline salvo política de `error_handling`).
Persistir el resultado en `method_outputs` bajo `provides='pdet_analysis.identify_confounders'` usando `_set_nested_value` (dot-notation) para ensamblaje determinista.

template.score_section:
### Evaluación Cuantitativa

- **Puntaje bruto**: {score}/3.0
- **Nivel de calidad**: {quality_level}
- **Confianza promedio**: {evidence.confidence_scores.mean}%
- **Cobertura de patrones**: {evidence.pattern_matches_count}/14 patrones detectados
template.title: ## Q255 | Análisis D3-Q5: Línea Base Cuantitativa en Derechos de las Mujeres | Líderes y lideresas, defensores y defensoras de derechos humanos, comunitarios, sociales, ambientales, de la tierra, el territorio y de la naturaleza

cluster_id.description: Cluster de análisis según el monolith, si aplica.

evidence.description: Objeto de evidencia ensamblado por el EvidenceNexus; debe cumplir evidence_assembly.output_schema.

metadata.description: Metadatos adicionales de la pregunta para consumo posterior.

policy_area_id.description: PA canónica, debe ser coherente con identity.policy_area_id.

question_global.description: Índice global de la pregunta (de questionnaire_monolith).

trace.description: Información de trazabilidad (provenance, logs) específica de la ejecución.

validation.description: Resultado de validaciones lógicas de la respuesta (coherencia, integridad, etc.).

patterns.pattern: esto permitirá que|lo cual contribuirá a|generando una disuasión
el mecanismo es que la protección material disuade a los agresores
a través de las campañas de no estigmatización, se reduce la legitimación de la violencia
la respuesta rápida a las alertas permite prevenir que las amenazas se materialicen
cadena de valor de la protección|ruta de cambio

question_context.policy_area_label: Líderes y lideresas, defensores y defensoras de derechos humanos, comunitarios, sociales, ambientales, de la tierra, el territorio y de la naturaleza
question_context.question_text: ¿El PDM explica cómo los productos (ej. 'líderes con esquema de protección') contribuyen a generar resultados (ej. 'reducción del número de agresiones')? Se debe buscar este 'mecanismo'.

signal_requirements.note: Signal requirements are currently under development. Signal IDs will be populated once the signal_registry provides a canonical mapping for PA01/DIM01.

traceability.provenance_note: This contract was generated with full multi-method orchestration support. The method_binding.methods array contains all multiple methods from D1_Q1_QuantitativeBaselineExtractor, and human_answer_structure documents the expected evidence output after execution.

rules.description: Auto-generated: require all required expected_elements types
Auto-generated: encourage optional evidence types when available
